name: convert-3d-models
title: Convert 3D Models
description: An extension to convert 3D models to different formats.
author: mrnoisytiger

preferences.title: FreeCAD Path
preferences.name: freeCADPath
preferences.description: Path where FreeCAD is installed (with the trailing slash). Typically /Applications/FreeCAD.app/.

preferences.title: Model Input
preferences.name: inputMethod
preferences.description: Where to obtain the model file to modify.

preferences.title: Model Output
preferences.name: modelResultHandling
preferences.description: How to handle the result of the model conversion, i.e. where to save the modified model, or whether to copy it to the clipboard.

commands.name: convert
commands.title: Convert Models...
commands.subtitle: Convert 3D models files
commands.description: Convert the selected model to the specified format.

preferences.title: Enabled Formats
preferences.label: STEP
preferences.name: showSTEP
preferences.description: Whether to show STEP as a conversion option.

preferences.label: STL
preferences.name: showSTL
preferences.description: Whether to show STL as a conversion option.

preferences.label: OBJ
preferences.name: showOBJ
preferences.description: Whether to show OBJ as a conversion option.

preferences.label: 3MF (Not recommended)
preferences.name: show3MF
preferences.description: Whether to show 3MF as a conversion option. Results may be subpar.

preferences.label: IGS
preferences.name: showIGS
preferences.description: Whether to show IGS as a conversion option.

preferences.label: X3D (Untested)
preferences.name: showX3D
preferences.description: Whether to show X3D as a conversion option. This option is untested. Use at your own risk.

preferences.label: X3DZ (Untested)
preferences.name: showX3DZ
preferences.description: Whether to show X3DZ as a conversion option. This option is untested. Use at your own risk.
